descriptions.quickAnalysis: Analyzes your project structure and generates intelligent agents for optimization
descriptions.dashboard: Opens the full TrueNorth dashboard in your browser for advanced monitoring and control
descriptions.analyzeProject: Analyzes your entire project structure and generates comprehensive optimization agents
descriptions.securityScan: Scans your codebase for security vulnerabilities and compliance issues
descriptions.sustainability: Analyzes resource usage and suggests eco-friendly optimizations
descriptions.cleanCode: Removes unused code, optimizes imports, and cleans up your codebase for better maintainability
descriptions.performance: Identifies performance bottlenecks and optimizes code execution for faster performance
descriptions.deployAgents: Runs all generated agents in an optimized deployment sequence for maximum efficiency
descriptions.retryFailed: Re-runs any agents that failed during previous execution with improved error handling
descriptions.stopAll: Immediately stops all running agents and cancels pending tasks for emergency shutdown
